## Acceptance Checklist

- [ ] **Anti-repeat**: No repeated actions or manual steps that should be automated
- [ ] **No-docs-secrets**: No secrets or credentials in code or documentation
- [ ] **Tests/Checks**: All relevant tests pass and checks are green
- [ ] **Rollback**: Clear rollback plan documented below
- [ ] Builds/runs
- [ ] No breaking API changes (or versioned)
- [ ] No secrets added
- [ ] Minimal diff / focused PR
